products.name: Fresh Step Non-Clumping Clay Litter with Febreze

extendedInfo.detail: 7-Day odor control. Now with Febreze freshness. Superior Odor Control System (vs. leading non-clumping litter): Longest lasting odor control (vs. leading non-clumping litter). Paw-activated for Febreze freshness. Natural, high-absorbing clay. No clump just dump. Additional uses: Clean up driveway oil, grease spots and paint. Get better tire and foot traction on slippery roads, sidewalks and steps. Freshen trash cans and diaper pails. Questions or Comments? Please visit our website at www.freshstep.com or call 1-800-325-9259.  20 Paw Points Rewards: Join Paw Points and turn litter into rewards! Earn rewards for buying the litter you love. How to Earn Points: Sign up on freshstep.com or download the Paw Points app. Locate reward code below for your unique Paw Points code. Enter the code or upload your purchase receipt and earn 20 points!
extendedInfo.directions: Direction for Use: Fill your clean litter box with 2-3 inches of Fresh Step litter. Additional Fresh Step litter is recommended if the litter box is used by more than one cat. Remove solid waste daily and dispose of in the trash. Sprinkle additional Fresh Step litter in the litter box each time you remove solid waste to help keep the litter box fresh. Do not flush down the toilet or drain. This is a No Clump, just Dump litter. Empty the entire litter box as needed, usually about once a week. Dispose of used litter in trash. Tips for a Happy and Healthy Cat - Recommended by cat behaviorists: The Best size and number of litter boxes: 1 1/2 times the length of cat, from nose to base of tail. As cats get bigger, so should boxes. Kittens need low-sided boxes for easy access. To avoid accidents outside of the litter box, maintain 1 box per cat plus 1 additional box. From nose to base of tail. 1.5X.
extendedInfo.warnings: Toxoplasmosis Warning: We would like to remind our customers, especially pregnant women and immunosuppressed persons, that cat feces can sometimes transmit a disease called toxoplasmosis. Therefore, always remember to wash hands thoroughly after handling used cat litter. For further information, consult your doctor. Unused cat litter poses no toxoplasmosis threat.
extendedInfo.countryOfOrigin: Made In USA Of Global Ingredients.,USA
